original_sentence: The quince harvesting process takes place in October and November.

original_sentence: Every day, from 7am the manager checks that the plantation has not been affected by codling moth.
column15: Every day, from 7am the manager checks that the plantation has not been affected by codling moth, if it is affected that day's production is interrupted.

original_sentence: Every day, from 7am the manager checks that the plantation has not been affected by codling moth.
column15: Every day, from 7am the manager checks that the plantation has not been affected by codling moth, if it is affected that day's production is interrupted.

original_sentence: The employees begin to pick the fruits at 8am, when the quinces have almost no dew.
column15: The employees begin to pick the fruits at 8am, when the quinces have almost no dew.

original_sentence: If the workers have not taken a break before 1pm, the manager reminds them that they should take a break soon.
column15: If the workers have not taken a break before 1pm, the manager reminds them that they should take a break soon.

original_sentence: 7 hours after the employees started picking the fruits, the trucks come and begin to collect the baskets with the quinces at most until 5pm.
column15: 7 hours after the employees started picking the fruits, the trucks come and begin to collect the baskets with the quinces at most until 5pm.

original_sentence: The supervisor records the fallen fruit not later than 30 minutes after the trucks have finished collecting the baskets.

original_sentence: In the evening, the supervisor records the total number of kilos collected and the hours the employees have worked.

original_sentence: The ISP sends an invoice by email to the customer on the first working day of each month (Day 1).
column15: The ISP sends an invoice by email to the customer on the first working day of each month (Day 1).

original_sentence: The ISP sends an invoice by email to the customer on the first working day of each month (Day 1).
column15: The ISP sends an invoice by email to the customer on the first working day of each month (Day 1).

original_sentence: On Day 7, the customer has the full outstanding amount automatically debited from their bank account.
column15: On Day 7, the customer has the full outstanding amount automatically debited from their bank account.

original_sentence: If an automatic transaction fails for any reason, the customer is notified on Day 8.
column15: If an automatic transaction fails for any reason, the customer is notified on Day 8.

original_sentence: On Day 9, the transaction that failed on Day 7 is re-attempted.
column15: On Day 9, the transaction that failed on Day 7 is re-attempted.

original_sentence: If it fails again, on Day 10 a late fee is charged to the customer's bank account.
column15: If it fails again, on Day 10 a late fee is charged to the customer's bank account.

original_sentence: On Day 14, the Internet service is suspended until payment is received.
column15: On Day 14, the Internet service is suspended until payment is received.

original_sentence: If on Day 30 the payment is still outstanding, the account is closed and a disconnection fee is applied.
column15: If on Day 30 the payment is still outstanding, the account is closed and a disconnection fee is applied.

original_sentence: Committee Members are advised a week before each meeting to read all related documents.
column15: Committee Members are advised a week before each meeting to read all related documents.

original_sentence: If the request is not completed in 7 days, then the employee must receive an “approval in progress” email.
column15: If the request is not completed in 7 days, then the employee must receive an “approval in progress” email.

original_sentence: If the request is not finished within 30 days, then the process is stopped and the employee.
column15: If the request is not finished within 30 days, then the process is stopped and the employee.

original_sentence: All of this must be completed by 2:30 pm, if it is not, then an alert should be sent to the supervisor.
